lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Sometimes-- are we really just going? (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Marisha caught in flagrante delicto!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: She's going after the presents underneath the tree.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keep Christmas going!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Critmas! Say it right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Praise be to Jesus Crit.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Guys. How is everybody doing?

lines.name: LAURA, MATT
lines.text: Good, how are you?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Wonderful. Merry Critmas, everyone.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: It's the holiday season.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've got gifts. We've got the spirit of Christmas. There's a light snowfall. When we were driving up, did you guys see that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was ash, something was on fire.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Yeah, so the Warner Brothers tower was being drizzled with snow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Drizzled?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Is the music too loud, Denise?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: DENISE
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: When she has spoken, she has spoken. It's over after that. Tonight, we're going to do Critmas on the show. There's not going to be a Critical Role on Thursday the 22nd. Instead, we're going to open our Critmas presents and hang out, just have fun, and towards the end of the episode, we're going to play our What Does Critical Role Mean To You? videos that you guys have sent in, so stick around for that. Yes, very excited! Before we get going, I didn't have time to send in a video, because I missed the deadline. Instead, I'm going to read my Critmas letter to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Batten down the hatches!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: What do you mean, Oh no?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on, wait. Can I repour my glass of wine that spilled at the very top of the episode?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: You absolutely can. Matt? How was your week?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: My week was crazy. I'm looking forward--

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I'm looking forward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Hi.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Did you see Marisha pop into his frame for a second, then pop back out? (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Marisha, if you've finished up in there, you can also dust in the dining room, and the bathrooms need to be cleaned as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that a knock at the door?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Uncle--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: --David Bowie? I don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nice, but too soon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you trying to save this episode? It's too early to save this episode.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: We could totally start over, but the shittiness of this fits the last five episodes so well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're on brand right now.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Like I said, I wasn't able to send in a video, because I missed the deadline, but I did write you guys a Critmas letter that I'm going to read to get us started.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it in screenplay format?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: It is not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: "Matt, Marisha--" These aren't in any particular order, I promise.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You better say my name next.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: No, I mean, there's only eight of them."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did we really send a courier?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Laura!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: There, among the stray cats and drifters, I finally gathered the strength to read that note. I held it close to the barrel fire I had just cooked my dinner over, and I opened the note. The first thing I noticed was it was quite short. The second thing I noticed about this note offering me the job was that it wasn't even handwritten. But that night, my life would change, for the note read, very simply, "Hardwick passed. You're up. Travis." (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So true.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Listen, I have illegible writing.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: But thank you, guys. Years from now, when I'm living off the money I make at conventions in Paraguay and robbing the elderly, I'll be grateful. I'll always remember where I got my start. My first gig. That gig was the gig I do after my contract here is up. Please contact my reps for hosting opportunities after the 31st of-- we'll just say later. But thank you, Critical Role, for the opportunity to ask you guys questions about yourselves." (cheering and laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's what the Critmas spirit is all about.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Cheers, guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Next, our musical guests, the Stray Cats. I'm excited that you happen to know them.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Taliesin, big fan of the Stray Cats. Okay, let's begin.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are we doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is this where we start opening things? What are we doing?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Let's open things. Oh, we're going to play the intro?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, roll the opening for the opening.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there ever a wrong clip of Sam?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there ever a right one?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: How does this work? You grab them, and we talk about who sent them out?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Usually, we talk amongst ourselves.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want Marisha to put some nail wraps on me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We just figured we could have a classic Critmas powwow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe we should go around the room while we're opening and just say one thing we're grateful about.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: God, I'm going to barf all over you. Do not make us do this shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How about we say one thing that we like about Brian?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's even harder.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: At least you won't have to worry about taking up too much time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You want to go first, Travis?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: All right, let's begin. I'm ready.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I, for one, appreciate that Travis's letter got to you before the restraining order did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true. You were able to head that one off at the pass.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A little bit of backpedalling on our part.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: The courier's name? Was fucking Glenn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT, LAURA
lines.text: God damn it, Glenn.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: For anyone who has not seen the show, they're like--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The fuck?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What I like about you, Brian, is that the first time you came-- well, I guess it wasn't the first time. The first time you came to set after you got this job? You made us all Old Fashioneds during Critical Role.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You make a mean Old Fashioned, and I wish that kept going.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I'm here every Thursday. I could keep doing it. The only problem is they're quite tasty and then by half-time, maybe, everybody could be a little drippy. We'll just limit to four hours? You could do two. Do one at the break. That's a good enough amount of time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't look at me! I'm not allowed to drink during any of the games.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: You drink, what is that? Tang?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No one else puts that on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. I have way too much to concentrate on every time we do an episode. I can't drink.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Still a self-imposed rule.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Ladies and gentlemen, french horns are back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Please don't turn them off. Oh, okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's not french horns.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm thankful for the day that you showed me a video from the wedding of me when I barely knew you, walking by, and me scowling or grimacing at you. You see this? Here, I'm going to walk by and watch what you do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you do that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't remember it.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Yeah, I walked by, and he was like--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was probably a reaction to your skinny pants and my admiration/envy.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: They were skinny back then, too. I was like a size zero. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is why we don't let him drink.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I make the shitty jokes on this show!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I make the jokes that people hate.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I admire the fact that you've overcome your handicap, which we all know is that he's smooth down there. It's like a Ken doll. There's no genitalia. It's just shiny and plastic. It's just, there's nothing. Just nothing there. But you've somehow overcome that and had a relatively normal life.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Nothing I can say. Right now, I can see tweets, I can see Tumblr, I can see Reddit, I can see people showing up at my house, so I'm just going to say thank you, Sam.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can see fan art, weirdly.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I can see fan art. I'm just going to say thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am thankful for your ability to wear the top button of your collared shirt closed, whether you're wearing a tie or not.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Thank you. I do not know how to tie a tie, however.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that a clip-on?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a clip-on.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Denise had to tie my tie tonight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She did a good job. I mean, it's a little--

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I crawled in here, and I said, "Denise, I'm so sorry for how I've treated you." And she said, "I'm so sorry, remind me who you are, again?" (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have a key card?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Nope. Someone tagged me in a Reddit thing today, and they were like, "I love how shady Brian is." (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was my compliment!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Please tell me that's on your business card: "Brian Wayne Foster. Shady."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's more of a, "Meet me out back." That's all it says. "Meet me out back."

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Yeah, I could totally give those out to girls at bars. "Meet me out back." Nobody's going to think anything of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You definitely shouldn't do that. You shouldn't be hitting on girls at bars.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's on his LinkedIn profile.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: People are always coming out to my car.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It says, "Meet me out back." And on the other side of the card, it says, "Steak house." Meet me at the out back, steak house. It's great. It's a terrible joke. I feel bad for making it.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: So five days until Christmas, and then ten days until New Years, from tonight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, from tonight! Because it's the 20th.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Christmas from tonight. Tuesday, December 20th--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is right now.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: The night of our lord, Tuesday.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've had the Thordak fight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We just rolled all our new characters yesterday.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was a crazy night.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It didn't go at all how I expected.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In a way, though, it was fitting. It was a fitting end.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought so, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The Scanlan/Grog love interest thing, I was not prepared for that. It was really--

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Okay, here's my top three moments from the Thordak episode: Taliesin rolled very well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I did.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: These were the things that surprised me: Taliesin rolled very well. Sam knows a lot more Melissa Etheridge songs that we all thought.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we thought he knew a lot!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did not see that coming.

lines.name: TRAVIS, BRIAN
lines.text: Thanks, Keyleth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's not the internet I know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not today. Not here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm hoping for some of that to change in 2017. Bright new future.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: He's back. Hey, last week on the show, a week ago--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You got to fill me in, because I don't watch this shit.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I wouldn't either. Don't like the host. A week ago tonight, Will Friedle was on the show.

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: He threw some shade down about your Cowboys, and my Cowboys, and Laura's Cowboys, and my uncle Bill's Cowboys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I heard.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Yeah, he's a Deflatriots fan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I know, it's okay, He lives really close to us. I visited him that night.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: This is now your time, this is your-- Equal time, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is this bear pelt?!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Sorry, Trinket.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I stood in front of his dark bedroom, breathing heavily, and then put my hand over his now-wife's mouth, and said, "Shh, it's time for a conversion therapy session. You will love the Cowboys." And he said, "No, I don't want to, I don't want to love winners, Tom Brady is the best." I-- is nobody else following what I'm--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I'm so delighted, we're all on board, keep going.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're talking about the Old West, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought we were talking about Mike Pence.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I thought we were talking about Knock Knock.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. Yeah, that's it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's open presents.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's. Please. Open presents. Please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, let's open presents.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How are we going to do this? Someone go and get them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I got some on the end.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Oh my goodness, it's the FBI.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's the presents?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Trying to make it festive.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Bag those two, for sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just bring anything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Somebody was cooking meth this year.

lines.text: Sam is sponsoring this episode of Talks Machina.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sponsoring this episode?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Who decided to sponsor our December 20th episode of Talks Machina?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have no idea. This is your show. I'm actually-- I'm still stunned that we pay you for this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is for Critical Role.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: That's interesting to learn myself. I was not aware of it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a present for the group from Scott McLean.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scott McLean.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (paper rustling)

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Let's trash this place.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is just-- What is it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know yet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a circle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a dragon!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.text: There's a Bigby's Hand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's straight-up paper.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How did that not get crushed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's really fucking nuts.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Those are beautiful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Those are awesome.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Those are great, thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scott McLean.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got something from... There's no name!

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Someone get a close-up on Taliesin, Denise.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Travis. Me. Liam. Marisha. And Sam.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And there's a little note.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Matt, and the rest of the cast. Sorry, Taliesin.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Matt and me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: These are from James Hoelscher, or tazman5296 in chat on Twitter.

lines.text: How did you know?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, he sent my boots of haste?

lines.text: Yeah, he sent that ivy circlet that I used to have.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, the arrows!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Oh, that's great. That?s really cool.

lines.text: What have we got? What is this stuff? Tiny things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He says he's sent stuff before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is awesome.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yeah, it's like the spiritual successor to Three Wolf Moon.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Oh my God, that's glorious.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are going camping in these shirts.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We are so going camping.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a tough-looking bear.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is the bear wearing a torc?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He is, it's like if he got awakened.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm pretty sure all my shirts could kick your shirts' ass.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: BRIAN

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's the wrong shape.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you, James! Sorry about that.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA, MATT
lines.text: Thank you, James.

lines.text: We'll cut that out.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: BRIAN

lines.text: She's Ryuti76 in the chat.

lines.text: Is what? Say it again, please?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ryuti76 in chat.

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, because she made them!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. She designed them, it's the D&D symbol with our names.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is so cool!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's really cool!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How many shirts are there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A lot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She did her thesis on Critical Role.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, she graduated with a BFA in graphic design, dude.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gang, gang, gang. The smallest sizes are mediums so the ladies will be getting the mediums.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You also take the one for Ash.

lines.text: What's a BFA? I have a BFF.

lines.text: Is it me? Is it me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we let them know that we got their letter? Can I say it? This is a lovely letter from tazman5296. Dude, thank you so much. Thank you so much for the Big Brothers Big Sisters.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is so sweet! Thank you, Rebecca.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think we're shy one unless I missed one in the box.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've got to get one, got to have one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let me see.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: These are a good size.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everyone knows she'll cut them up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: No. No. Denise! She tricked me!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Nothing, it's fine. Travis saw it.

lines.text: Oh wow, look at all these things over here! What is this?

lines.text: Oh, wow.

lines.text: This is from a Critter named AmniClerk @Stories_nDreams. It's an embossed Critical Role-y card that she made. It says, "May the happiness of family, the joys of friendship, and the warmth of love surround you this season. Also, fuck you, Brian." That's weird.

lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.text: That's so strange.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "For all the love and support you've given myself and the rest of the Critter legion, thank you, Happy Winter's Crest and beyond." And inside are--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whoa, oh my god.

lines.text: Oh my god, they're so pretty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Liam. Taliesin.

lines.text: Aw! I got a blue one.

lines.text: Let's put them on the tree!

lines.text: Put Ashley's on the tree.

lines.text: Are they ornaments?

lines.text: They're ornaments.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's an ornament, okay, good. I'm going to put this on my tree, tonight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh.

lines.name: LIAM

lines.text: Thank you!

lines.text: Oh look, it has a little Percy. What great penmanship. Sorry, that was my immediate thought.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: BRIAN, TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god. That is so cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is amazing.

lines.text: I have my hand out. I know, it's gone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We know! Oh my god it says #WeKnow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: #WeKnow! Oh, that's so good. Clever! That's amazing!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Is that underwear, Liam?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks for keeping us streaming.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I'll take them.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's like carnival music.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, this music is really messed up right now.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: This is a fan-favorite music. I'll have you know the French horns are the biggest thing to happen to this show since Sam was on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god! I wanted to open the chocolates-- I thought they were for all of us, but it's just to me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow, you're going to have to show us that letter to make sure that's true.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "Dear Laura. Last year, when Matt read that I like the dark chocolate truffles with Baileys filling, yours and Marisha's eyes indicated your interest. Therefore I address this box to you to share with the entire cast and crew." (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you hear her disappointment that she had to share it with me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "I tried to donate to each person's individual charity over the course of the year." That's wonderful.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's a greedy bastard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know why, but he is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Awesome!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does that mean he gets to cut us open when one of us finally dies?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: It's weird that he saw that in your eyes, because all I see is darkness.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks, Paul Nelson!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "Dear Critical Role, as an avid viewer of the show, and an occasional viewer of Matt and Marisha's Critmas periscopes, I seem to remember Marisha mentioning her love of leggings. My wife is a LuLaRoe consultant, her shop can be found on Facebook, and offered to send in a few pairs of leggings for the ladies." You can keep doing that, I don't mind, but massage if you're going to do it. These are six-- No, my ears, man. Six sets of leggings. Pick one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're soft, Marisha!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are they comfy?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, I want these ones!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Remember that two are for Ashley.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, there's six, and two of them are for Ashley?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's not here, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's true. That is true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's probably watching, though. Not right now, because it's not live.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's good for Ashley? Ashley, which one's good for you?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: You could ask her boyfriend!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like these are good for Ashley.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like those are actually good for Ashley

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Those are good, also any of the other ones.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The corduroy patches.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: She would take anything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is from Kane Velante, and she says, avid member of our show and all of the artistic masterpieces that people-- I don't want to read the whole letter because of time, but they basically gave new minis to Grog and--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, these are good too! Look at that. It looks just like you!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's got wings, motherfucker! Thank you!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's true, I've been waiting for a "and then I fly away." We haven't had a "and then I fly away."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Guys, can we see him? This is legit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's pretty good, yeah, it's pretty great.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Hey, I have something here! Yeah, it's from my probation officer. No, I'm just kidding. Oh, it says "Liam." Liam, there's a note for you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it from my second family in Nevada?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Hold on, let me skim through this. It says-- oh, you left your lights on outside.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, thanks.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Oh, I know, I'm going to give this to Liam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It is for Liam.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Yep, hold on, it's rubber-banded. "Don't go drinking with hobbits."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No promises.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: With lyrics by people whose names I can't pronounce. And they sent this rubber band for Marisha.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh thanks, dude!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: They sent this for-- is that the audiobooks? Is that what it is, CDs? Hold on, please accept these items as a token of my--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "Stunning dramatized BBC production of Tolkien's classic is presented in 13 hours on 13 compact discs. Starring Ian Holm, and featuring a cast of 25 performers, specially composed music and sound effects, in this beautifully packaged box said to be the perfect gift for every Tolkien fan." That's me!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: elenoirproudfoot, thank you so much.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bailey's truffle. That's what I want.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That looks so cool, thank you! Can I see the letter?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Yes, that's for you. I was just going to hand that to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got one!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, Travis has one!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "There isn't enough space to convey my thoughts, I am a novice Critter right now with hopes that I'll speed up to speed soon. Please accept this small token of appreciation with the warmest, awesome members of Critical Role. Warm regards, Aaron." It is a DVD copy of Critters.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, the classic movie.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I actually did creature noises, and-- nah, I'm going to shut up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You were ten.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know. I'm a liar and a thief.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow! I think my mom may have worked on one of those, too. Of course she did.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Critters 3? Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, it sounds like something my mom would do. I'll double-check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who's opening next?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Work. Work harder! They sent Percy an in-game letter, which is really spectacular, from a citizen of Whitestone who was a tinkerer of his own. I'll put some quotes up later. He said that he sent-- this is a prototype of something they've been working on, and this is the only one they'll making of this scale.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the heck?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But they sent a prototype of something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a gun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my-- (exclamations of awe)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And it has a scope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does it spin?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's find out if it-- no, it's designed to look like it spins but actually-- oh my god!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's been engraved.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, in fact, that would work really well--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: TSA won't have a problem with that at all.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, TSA, they won't be like last time! This will not be like last time.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: And here's the deal, too. Also, so we're aware going forward because I got this note handed to me from one of the producers. "Any gifts opened on the set can be chosen as set pieces by the host." So what it says here is starting with Taliesin's gun and then any of the gifts afterwards. It's a very long explanation. Article two, paragraph three. Laura, find a good home for that tonight on the set.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You got it. You got it, BFF. Whatever you need.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, it needs a little leather strap, too. I want to do some stuff to it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) A little leather strap is what it needs!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is from Melanie Gurran and she sent us seaglass that she has collected from the shores of Washington that is apparently lucky, and if we-- Taliesin. She said that they're lucky stones so that if we put them in our dice bag, maybe it would bring us good luck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like it even though she put Raishan on the freaking packaging!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, Laura part two, because she knows.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Really? Oh, she does know! Never mind, she's the best.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And this is for Ashley--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What piece of music is this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, thank you! What did we get?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: That's playing right now, Liam. No, I mean, Taliesin?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, there's sheet music on the back of the card.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I read music. My tune actually goes (imitates guitar riff)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was nice, baby.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was from Splash.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you can see it right there. That's my sheet music. You follow along in three-quarter-eighteenth's time in a D-minor major chord.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so excited by it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And this one, which I think Liam needs to read.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Lieber Matt Mercer und die gesamte Critical Role crew. Ich heiße Daniel-- That means "I am Daniel." Bin dreiundzwanzig. Komme aus Deutschland. Oh, he's from Germany. Und sehe eure Serie regelmäßig. I'm saying a lot of this wrong, but I'm saying a lot of it right! Leider nicht-- Oh, you lost me. Die Serie ist großartig. Sie hat-- I'll just read it to myself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And it goes on like that!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can hear the sound of one subscription being lost in the Twitch channel going (ping).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I followed some of that!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Es gibt Critical Role. Matt, ganz im Ernst.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Und Grog is the best.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I see my name.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Besonders Laura Bailey. Yeah, this says everyone is good except Laura Bailey. Sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stop reading this letter.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can't read it! I took three years of high school German, goddamn it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That so qualifies you to be reading that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: UNICEF donation!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is for Liam. This is for-- it's ink and a feather. What do you think, is this Matt?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, it's packets of tea!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's Scanlan. There's Marisha. So it is for Matt!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was close. It wasn't except for Laura, it's

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it's all in English, too!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No oolong?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit! Somebody didn't do their homework!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, there is a ton in here! Maybe you got oolong in that. Thank you so-- oh, wait, they sent another thing. What is this? This is pretty. Oh, it's a long letter. She's from Boston.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: TALIESIN (German accent): This is how we say goodbye in Boston, Dr. Jones.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I love the Last Crusade reference.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fine art photography of some sort.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's so cool!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, Daniel, your English is very good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you see that? It's a really cool photograph. Its got feathers and a braid there, that there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Paige Weggle sent me a packet of mayo!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh that's funny, a packet of mayo!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) We haven't opened it yet! You have to open the mayo.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, don't!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: They sent mayonnaise?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They sent you mayonnaise.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I have a really cool letter here from Thomas Dunwoody, who writes about how we helped him through his deployment and missing his friends and family, the show helped him get through that and he looks forward to hopefully meeting us at a Denver Comic Con sometime. As soon as he can find the list of everyone's favorite charities he promises to pledge $50 to each of them. Thank you.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Where can they find that list, Matt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you do a search for the Critter's guide to Critmas on the Geek and Sundry website or do a Google search for Critter's guide to Critmas. You can find all our charities on there to support for this season. That is awesome! Thank you so much.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is the rulebook, as I gather, but look at this game board. Look at that!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you serious? That's really great!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to, if no one objects, I'm going to bring it home and look at it with my son.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's super cool! It's getting wrinkled! I'm going to roll it.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: How cool is that? Little context, there is a family tradition in Cullin's family that goes back to 850 C.E. in Germany where the engaged couple would be given one of these by everyone in the town.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I love how he hands it to me because he knows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I like this tradition. Why?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a good tradition.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: This is a really cool letter. I'll let you guys read this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is how we settle arguments.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, exactly! That's why I handed it to her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is what we call marriage counseling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You win. I'm sorry. I like how you're still German for no reason.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's amazing, thank you! Whoever-- oh, a Norse colony in Germania.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But they originated in Germany, so you were right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like the notion that a bunch of Norse got to Germany and said, "Yeah, we're done."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, this is how we settle things now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's cold enough now. We're done.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is for you, Matt. This is from Josh Miller or @JMiller1 on Twitter. We read your letter, Josh. It's amazing, and hopefully we do run into you, maybe in the near future. He said that this is for you, specifically.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I already see pentagrams, so I can hope it's to finally summon my patron. Oh, your guys' favorite! Hourglasses!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes! I love them!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That one is for shopping.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) That's so cool! Oh, it looks like it's a dark brown sand, too. It's got dragon heads pointing upwards. It's soul sand, from Minecraft.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is nuts.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm so glad we all survived that dragon fight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that could have gone really poorly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, except for Kima and Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you so much. I appreciate that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's another one, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's another one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would say look at the letter first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit! This is a donation from Sarah Sutton to Mark Sutton. Wait, hang on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mark Sutton Ministries. They help out Haitian residents.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yay, Sarah! You're awesome, Sarah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nice letter from high schooler Nicholas McGuire whose stumbled onto our show clicking a link off of a HotPepperGaming episode. It takes all kinds.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We apologize that it was not porn. It was the only link on the internet that wasn't.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "The subject critters are rumored to-- blooming onions!" What? "The subject critters are rumored to be vulnerable to blooming onions--" I don't understand the sentence structure. "Shiraz and generally drive to and from work in the pouches of chaotic evil kangaroos. Dr. Oz." What is this? Ooh, it's a bunch of minis! Ooh, they're all kinds of different cool stuff. Ooh, these are all creepers!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, that looks like Zahra.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, they go to Matt first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, it's like a ghoul Zahra. It's zombie Zahra.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I actually have a really amazing letter here from Jade Rose from the UK, who is currently in New York City for the last few days of the holiday. Really, this sweet letter I've read most of it, I'm going to read the rest later on. Thank you so much. It's really sweet. Thank you for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thanks for all you do, teaching the kids!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to put him on the tree, too!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Hey, guys. Monica Monmon--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also known as @madqueenmomo. She's one of our prolific artists.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: @madqueenmomo was what I was going to say next. "Wanted to give you all a big thank you for constantly inspiring artists everywhere weekly." The artists are the inspiring ones, these guys aren't. I'm just kidding. "Doing my final semester of art school. Every week you inspire so many critters I felt like it was time to give back. In this box you will find a studio pouch dice bag filled with sharpies, markers, and sketching pencils for everyone. I've also included a tiny sketchbook."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's so cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're so cute!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are the things inside?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's inside are sketchbooks. Monica, thank you so much.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (noises of delight)

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: They all have sketchbooks in them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, wow!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is so amazing! I'm so happy right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look! She did short-haired Keyleth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What a fun gift!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is definitely going to be a con bag.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is going to be my new journal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look at all that anime.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're really cute.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're the cutest!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I have a letter here Taliesin gave me earlier. Whoa!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Take a quick look at that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: TL; DR. "Dear Matt: Congratulations on your engagement and another successful year on Critical Role. Please accept this gift as a patronage for your outstanding work on the show and your gracious love towards the community. Much love, Shepherd. Enclosed in this box you will not only find a generous donation to First Book--? by the way, Shepherd donated 250 dollars to First Book in our name. Thank you so much. "But a sea ghost skeletonized mechanical watch." What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Open the box.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Open the box!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What?! Are you kidding me?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Enjoy your box.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Look at that shit!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's an Invicta watch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's amazing!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that's a nice watch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who gets to wear it first?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No! Me only. That is so amazing. That goes on my arm right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a shame that those bracelets are grafted into your flesh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pass it around, let's see it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow, that's very nice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a story written about the mother of the twins from Paige. Paige, I'm going to read it after the show but I've got it. Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got a wonderful little note from Alison Trace. She knitted a little superior healing potion. She said it's for Percy, but she said it could go to anybody who needs it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: That's not what she said.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's inside?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's teeth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hope it's teeth because it can then go to my teeth collection.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Taliesin, god.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What, man?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You do have a teeth collection, don't you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have it powdered. I put it in your drink every week. Slowly I am getting inside of you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gross!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Make eye contact or go slow. No. You ruined me.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Cut the feed, Denise.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've got a red d4. I've lost it in my jam-jams.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jani Malkki, @realcamel on Twitter, sent us chocolate from Finland.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Finland chocolate?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Finland chocolate. That's the best Scandinavian country for chocolate.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a superior healing potion, so what's in a superior healing potion? 8d4. Eight red d4s.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That?s pretty cute.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's clever. That's really clever. You can actually have a superior healing potion ready to go in a bag.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't get it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's because you've never been healed in your life.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's never been an issue. It must be nice--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) It must be nice, it must be nice--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) --to have 700 hit points.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She gave me the turkey feather for my hat and sent you the raven feather because you play the raven paladin. So here is your prize for keeping me and my daughter entertained for the last year. A raven feather." Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I just read the letter from Jani Malkki over in Finland. Thank you so much. This is really sweet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's another short story from @Tiamat_ZX on Twitter, who I love. Thank you so much. I will read it when I get home.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: It's weird that Max laughs at all that stuff when he knows how professional I am. This is from a guy named Matt Miller-- Matthew Miller. He made a donation to the Children's Theater of Charlotte. It's a really good letter. I've been reading it for the past 43 minutes. He sent this, which is a box--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Box Machina.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I can't tell, but it's handwritten, and I just learned how to read from Grog. Beautiful dice set in a beautiful box.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's three chocolates left.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which ones?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This feels heavy. There might be a second row.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: There's eight of us. The chocolate did not make it to Matt and I.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is little needlepointed Scanlan shit.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: We got free shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stay creative and awesome!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Blue poop, take a shot. Everybody at home, it's time to take a shot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Love Neeska @ladyneeska. Thank you for more poop. This might be the best poop I've ever gotten.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a really solid poop.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: How many do you get, Sam?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've gotten a dozen or so, but this poop might be the the best poop I've ever gotten.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Are you going to sleep with that poop tonight, Sam?

lines.name: TALIESIN, BRIAN
lines.text: You should sleep with that poop on your chest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will. I'm going to Cleveland steamer myself with this tonight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so this dice set is actually Reya's first dice set they ever had.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: That's pretty awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's really sweet. Thank you so much. I love this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's next?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For Ashley.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Great. It's going in the bag.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Guys, so far, good episode of Talks Machina or best episode of Talks Machina?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're on it, Sam, so obviously--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Too easy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is from Judith, a.k.a. @judrakJ at Twitter from the Netherlands. Travis. Sam.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: That's north of here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hi. Do you know the feeling of writing your secret crush notes? Of course you do. Well, this is kind of the feeling I have writing this letter to you guys, so please forgive me if this letter is incoherent, a little awkward, and/or maybe a little coy."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yours is way longer than mine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm not going to read the whole thing, but I thought the beginning was cute.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: That's awesome.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mine just says, "You're handsomer than Travis."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really? Mine says, "I lied to Sam." (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Merry Critmas.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I am so happy. Oh, nice shot!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Amanda, your Kima cosplay is amazing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's so many undone letters. Look at all these letters!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (speaking) Is it a good sign that the crew all has nooses around their necks? Is that okay?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Appropriate for this time of year.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Someone donated to the Nature Conservancy, and I got a turtle. I don't know who this is from. Oh, jeez. They got this bookmark for you, Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! That's a turtle bookmark. I read a lot of books to my kids. Not to me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you read books to yourself, I would watch that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just read Rat Queens, finally.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, hey, that's good! It's so good! There's more coming now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, @dutchcritter. Your Gilmore-themed leather bag based off of your paladin's LARP tabard is awesome! And I like your little note at the back here. I think it's very true, so thank you so much. That's really sweet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know who this is. They just signed it "L". So whoever anonymously donated, you're awesome and thank you, L.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Brought to you by the letter L.

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA, MARISHA, MATT
lines.text: Thanks, L!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Oh, there's another engagement present! "Matt and Marisha, hi! You might remember us from Critmas last year. We sent you the Tolkien-style wood-burned map."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes! Which I still have in my office.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: "We wanted to send something else to say 'Congratulations on your engagement.' We know you guys love Avatar. So this is--" and then she tells me what it is, but I want you to open it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here, Marisha, you open it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: It's from Steve and Megan Katronio.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Steve and Megan! Thank you!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It is time for you to choose. It is time for you to choose good."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Iroh. Uncle Iroh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uncle Iroh! It's an Avatar map!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Yeah, she says, "This is the map from The Last Airbender. The show, not the movie, obviously." That's awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's so cool!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And it's an Iroh quote. Iroh's the best.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who wants to unwrap minis?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll unwrap minis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is from Michael W. Crabtree says, "Hi, Critical Role cast. I want to thank you for the amazing journey. I used these a lot during my teens dabbed with Pathfinder, blah blah blah," Oh, man. "Vex's death felt real. Being a twin myself, I recognised the distance willing to go to protect my sister. I'd like to thank Matt for making DM Tips and DMs Guild classes. Since watching, I pick up DM's books and now I'm currently running three six-to-eight-person 5e campaigns!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three campaigns?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Three. He says, "The blood hunter lycan order have been a joy to play."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow, that's a lot of terms that I don't even understand. "Critical Role has inspired me to channel my originality and thank you for letting me play with my seven-year-old daughter. It's okay to make believe, embrace who you are, enjoy the experience. Bring family together. I look forward to showing my daughter that dad is just as silly as she is. Michael W. Crabtree A.K.A-- How do you pronounce that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Zanyondelcet!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And he included these incredible--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These minis are amazing!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Retail box action?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Wow! That's no joke.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Liam, look at that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He said, "I have also included a more paladin-ish rogue Vax for you, if you'd like to use it in a home game."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Show it to the camera!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Liam, your embracing of the Raven Queen was by far my favorite part in your game."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wow! Look at how firm his buttocks are! Wow!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Finally! True accurate to the game!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good focus pulling, by the way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool! I like to think that he's got Whisper and the dragon sword.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who should box these?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These should go back in the box so they don't get damaged.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll take them. I'll put them on the shelf.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I have a present here from Rob? It just says "From Rob." Thank you, Rob!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, my name's Rob!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Could've been from Glenn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Awesome presents in the mail!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think this may have been from one of the letters we read earlier. It is a dungeon furniture pack.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a bunch of cool mini furniture bits and pieces.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Matt, here are some things for the dungeon to add to the atmosphere and make the players go, 'What's that?' 'You don't know. Do you want to examine it?' Have fun."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's so cool!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's bringing a new life to VHS cases.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got a lot of stuff from Valerie Thompson. She wrote, number one, a manuscript that she said Taliesin should read first, because you love to read. She made a bunch of bear paw stickers for me! And then she made a dragonscale pendant for each person because she's a dragonborn in her campaign. She's got a red one for Grog and a black one for Vax and a gold one for me and a brass one for Scanlan and a green for Keyleth, and the blue is for Percy-- yeah, it's a pendant! You got a platinum one, Matthew. And Ashley got a white one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's so cool!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're pretty!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're very olfactory today.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I feel like you could eat this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're clay pendants. She made them!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm pretty sure it's like taffy.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: No, don't eat it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can make them into chokers!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (gobbling sounds) I'm a turkey!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Really? She spent all this time on this, and you're going to make it into a turkey wattle?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a very funny turkey wattle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's got a little pin with hearts on it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Brian Wiggly Foster? Is that a vacuum-sealed pack?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: This is enough food to survive on Mars for two years.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mark Watney!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Guys, there's a note here that says: "Here is a labor of love. Laura used to do quilts, and probably could've done better, but it was made with all the best interest and it was the first time piecing shapes. The squares were printed by Matt Abernathy, and the design is by Kenneth Wriggles."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is a huge deal!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I can't read the last sentence until Denise brings me a scissors or a knife so I can open this-- oh, wait! Sorry, Denise! Sorry, Denise. I have to put Ashley down. All right girls, and Liam. Here it comes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is this empty?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Spread it out!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: "The star represents the star of the Cowboys. Sorry for not putting the line and the paws for Trinket. We love you all."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like how the Cowboys get representation, but Trinket does not.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Look at this list of people, you guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a you and Grog quilt!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Guys, look at this list of people that contributed to this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my-- holy cow!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is a real deal!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: These are the same people who did the one for us, too?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: This is the amount of people that worked on this quilt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who is it for? Who gets to have it? Because it looks like a whole lot of me and Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's you and Grog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm there because I'm her brother.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Baby, it's ours! Our quilt!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: It's you and Travis's, because it's got the Cowboys and the thing for Trinket.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know where this is going! This is going in the guest bedroom so that your guests can sleep on your pictures of you every time they visit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, Craven Edge! Guys, we can still go get Craven Edge, I'm just saying.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know where he is.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Put that in the guest room so I can sleep on it when I pass out drunk at your guys' house.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is going to be my TV-watching comfy throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You want to wake up and just have Grog's face right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I often do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is so amazing!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It must've taken hours! Days!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This would've taken so long.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a lot of work.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really, really awesome.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I live with a quilter. That's a lot of work.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, look at these! These are the teeniest little stitches I've ever seen!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He doesn't want to admit it, but Travis is actually crying right now.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Real human boy tears, too. Not those old, wooden ones.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I ain't crying. Wow! Look at the list of names!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Read all of them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (screams)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This was technically part of Critmas.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: What we asked people to do, we said ask for a donation in Scanlan's name.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They suggest I donate $55, $69, or $85, and in the spirit of Critmas, I'll consider that. They really want this!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, did you get stamps?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're not usable stamps. They're just stickers.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey! They knew.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: So you have to give a donation

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope! "No postage necessary if mailed in the United States."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have to leave the United States.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is fantastic.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Someone misunderstood "make a donation in Scanlan's name" for "

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's weirdly genius.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I love it. Send more requests for Sam to give other people money.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will donate, and I'll tweet about it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jasmine Riegel in Germany, I read your long--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Riegel?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Riegel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: R-I-E-G-E-L?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: R-I-E-G-E-L.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's me! This is my kincharkunen person! I don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a beautiful handwritten letter, which I won't read on air, but we're going to pass it around to everybody because we have so many letters, but thank you, I read the whole thing during the stream.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like I'm doing a Final Fantasy IV dungeon crawl right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we still on french horns?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, we are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It never ends.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's a box of something if somebody wants to unbox--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you. (laughs) Who's up next?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For Marisha, there are some princesses, apparently. Marisha has some princesses.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, cool!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's awesome! That is some awesome crossover.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For Matt, we've got a cowboy.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Oh, nice!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And something else--

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: (high-pitched voice) It's high noon!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then, sadly, this is for Ashley, but I guess she's not around right now.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Ooh, she's going to love this. We have a lot of cool Spider-Gwen stuff at the house.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you, Steven.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As benders, which I'm so about. I remember this series. I remember seeing it on Tumblr when it came out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they have a continuation of it here as well, which is awesome.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is pretty fucking awesome. Thank you so much!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is a really cool thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a bag if you want to keep your thing away from all the other terrible things--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "Laura, my husband and 12-year-old daughter are crazy about Critical Role. They're now playing D&D every Sunday with a small group here in Reno, Nevada. We thought of you when my ten-year-old was selling items for a fundraiser at school, and we hope you enjoy 'Trinket's Peanut Butter Bears!'"

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Whoa, give them to me!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? How? And also, they made a donation to My Friend's Place, which is my charity that I love.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: That's great!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm sorry. I've had some wine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you Andrew and Grace and Ashley and Michelle! Thank you, all of you. Sorry. What are you doing? What did you do? What are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nothing, a close up of the booze that Travis was trying to open. The camera keeps finding it! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm just trying to enjoy these season's greetings!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: We can't show the label.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's true, we can't. Unless they want to be a sponsor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They could be a sponsor. If Shlitzmalt Liquor wants to sponsor us-- (singing) Shlitzmalt Liquor bull!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, it looks like Travis had to find the bathroom and had an empty bottle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Brought to you by Shlitz: "Why did you have to do that?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Guys, I have some hand-done art from Jen Zurin Smith. I remember your art; I've seen it online. Here you go-- Taliesin. Marcia, here you go. This one's for me. Here you go. Hold that for Ashley. This is for Mr. Mercer.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Oh, this is so beautiful!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I remember seeing this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jen-- is it Zurin Smith?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe. Zurin?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: These are awesome! I like the colors!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Did we get them all in the shot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Almost. Missing Liam's.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jeez, I didn't know we were doing a whole thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Put it in the frame!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Put it in the fucking frame!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Now you're blocking-- there you go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fight, fight, fight!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I don't want to fight. I love you guys! I love everyone!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is awesome. Thank you so much!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Thank you so much!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: These are great!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Give me these Peanut Butter Bears!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's next?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the first box, so it resets, right? Open it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to be in a mocap suit, so tomorrow with all this chocolate.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: On a Wednesday?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because that velcro neon was so flattering to begin with.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does anyone else want a bear?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I have to try a peanut butter bear. It needs to happen.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, me too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll have a bear.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Trinket is delicious! He makes a great rug and a great chocolate bar.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Taliesin, you want a bear?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I definitely want a bear!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sam, would you like a bear?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll have a bear.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: (singing) Sam's like a bear-- he just said Sam's like a bear. (singing) I don't know where my home is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What I thought when I came in tonight-- what we were missing for Critmas, it was more Nelly Furtado.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: It was Nelly Furtado? I got that note.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I noticed.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: It is hard to talk.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My mom, Momlan, sent these for us for all of you guys. They're graphic novels. Momlan sent graphic novels for all of us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are those the graphic novels we spilled wine on at the top of the show?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, they are.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We added a splash of color.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Signed by the author, I believe. Jerome Charron, my mom's husband. I was going to say baby daddy, but that would-- nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's awesome!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. They're from Momlan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I call dibs on one with no wine on it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will take wine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a lot of porn in there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're really good. My mom's husband is a prolific author, and that is male genitalia right there. Brian, I'm sorry.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: For what? I have male genitalia.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well...

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Or I used to, before I went to that soft, smooth surface, which is way easier now. It's great when TSA pulls me aside. I go, "Grab it all! There's nothing."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's called

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So this is from Justin Sharp, who sent a tweet to us a while ago. I don't know if you guys remember, but his daughter had just been diagnosed with cancer. She's going through chemo right now, but he wanted to thank us for giving him an uplifting thing to watch every week. He sent us all ribbons so we can support Chloe as she's going through chemo. "As she's going through treatments, I'm asking people to send her cards to keep her spirits up. I'm sure she'd appreciate it if you guys could spread the word." So we'll put her little PO box number here so Critters can send her some cards.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I'm assuming it's a PO box, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what it says. So that's awesome. Love you, Justin. Love you, Chloe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Get it, Chloe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Having torn through Critmas--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we did it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was that all of it? Wait, there's this thing over here. What was that from?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's for a GoPro.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a piece of a GoPro.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why is there a piece of a GoPro--?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's my Secret Santa gift. Merry Christmas!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Every year, you'll get another piece until eventually you can assemble it into your own GoPro.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't give her false hope. That's not true.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we collect them all, maybe they'll sponsor us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no GoPro coming.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, and Matt, you have a letter over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, no way!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: That's a subpoena. I've seen one of those.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, is it yellow?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, and there's another letter here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is from Matthew Ravensbergen.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I'm so freaking jealous of that last name.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's like the alternate evil version of you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will not read this on stream because it says "do not read on stream," but thank you very much for the letter, and I will read this off stream, Matthew. Good strong name.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There should be a yellow sheet of paper somewhere around here. We got a letter from the Post Office asking that we renew our post office box for another year.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you Post Office! You've been gracious--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you for being okay when all of this fills your store.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you already read this? This is from an Elle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, Elle?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you read this one already? We didn't open this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we did. From Elle?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, no, there was an Elle that gave a donation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. This is from @cxnnamonspxder, but there's Xs in the places of the Is. Anywho, she made us drawings, you guys! And she donated to the Nature Conservatory.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does that mean I don't have to?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, Sam.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, look at Keyleth. That's adorable.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I love that we're all in little Christmas gear! This is so cute! There's Ashley's.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have Christmas tree earrings!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look at this! I'm wearing a Trinket sweater.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Grog's in a Santa hat. Someone will be punished for this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) "Someone will be punished for this."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Quick! Make them all kiss!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I can't reach that far.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I accidentally did that to my brother.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not the first time!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Awesome. That was nice. Now Christmas is over.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Brian prepared a game. It's called "Spin the Bottle."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: There's plenty of photographic and video evidence that-- yeah, that it's happened many times.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And this is where it devolves into "Truth or Dare."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If I could say something real fast?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow, that took a dark turn!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, well doesn't it always?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this where Matt quits the show?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Don't do it on this show.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I got what I came in here for, guys. I'm out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The lead singer spinning off. Solo album!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to run a game for stuffed animals.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd be okay with it. Well, no, a universal year-wrap-up here. We're going towards the end of our second year doing this craziness on stream and our four years playing this game-- plus now. And it's-- (sighs) I don't know, it's invigorating, it's delightful, and this is a perfect example of the amazing generosity that this community continuously perpetuates and helps support each other with. And us. We have the pleasure of being able to do this every week and have people care that aren't just us, and that's really cool. We constantly get letters and emails from a lot of people in this community saying how much this means to them, and I want to reiterate on that part. We're so glad, because it means so much to us, and it means so much that other people care about it as much as we do-- and I'm partially rambling now, but I'm really humbled and touched and proud. Proud of everything that you guys have done. We're such a small part of this now. This is so much bigger than anything we ever did or now do on this show, and that's what you guys continue to carry and make your own adventures, your own heroes, your own community support structures, and continue to make the world a better place through inspiration and storytelling and being good people. I think I speak for all of us when I say that we're extremely grateful and thankful and humbled by all of what you guys continue to put out there. And thank you. Thank you from the bottom of my heart and our hearts.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll a charisma check.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: That's awesome. Well, speaking of, after a month or more of asking for people to send in their "What does Critical Role mean to you?" videos, it's ready.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are we going to cry? Forever?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Everybody tear off a piece of the bearskin rug and prepare to use it as a Kleenex.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it set to Sarah McLachlan's "I Will Remember You?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was hoping it was going to be set to AC/DC's "Thunderstruck" but--

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Let's take a look.

lines.name: CRITTER
lines.text: Is it Thursday yet?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shit, man.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Told you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's really touching. That's incredible.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I want to thank everybody who sent in videos. I know for some of you it was really, really hard to put yourself on video and send it to us, and we thank you, and thank you for putting yourself out there. Obviously, you can tell it's hit home, and I'm sure all the rest of the Critters out there are so glad and encouraged that you guys did that. Thank you so much. That's all the time we have for this week, we are going to post that video on YouTube and the Geek & Sundry website, bunch of other places, so--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Brian, by the way.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Okay, thank you guys for coming. Thank you for doing Critmas on our show.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you for having us.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Hang out with your friends instead, and we will see you guys back on Talks Machina on January 3rd for our post-Thordak battle episode. Yes. Have a great Critmas everybody. We love you, don't forget to love each other, and don't worry-- fuck! It's almost January 3rd? (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's almost 2017.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: It's almost 2017. Good night everybody! (applause)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We love you, guys! Happy holidays! (Intro music) (Geek and Sundry jingle)
